#summary keeps areas in a DB

=== Table of Contents ===
<wiki:toc max_depth="2" />

= Introduction =
 * This plugin keeps areas in a DB
 * This plugins tables are located in [aarddb]

= Installation =
 * See the [Installation] Page
 * The command for this plugin is ardb

= Troubleshooting =
 * reset the db with "ardb refresh"

= Help =
{{{
Commands
debug           : toggle debugging
help            : show help
objects         : list objects associated with this plugin
refresh         : refresh areas
reset           : reset settings to default values
save            : save plugin variables
set             : set settings
showevents      : show functions registered for all events
showvars        : show plugin variables
windows         : list windows and some info associated with this plugin
}}}
